Authors:
Takashi Shirouzu, Ayaka Fujita, Masayuki Nakamura, Susumu
Takamatsu
Title:
Podosphaera prunigena occurred on leaves of Cerasus
kumanoensis
Abstract:
A powdery mildew that occurred on leaves of Cerasus
kumanoensis(Kumanozakura)was collected and identified as Po- dosphaera
prunigena by molecular phylogenetic analysis and morphological
comparison. Based on the observation of type specimen, the description
of P. prunigena was emended. Morphological features of conidia and
conidiophores not reported in the original description of P. prunigena
are described. This is the first report of powdery mildew on C.
kumanoensis.
